Name: Heaven's Door
Desc:
Opens the gateway to Heaven, punishing enemies and giving party members a blessing of life.
Heaven's Door cannot be recast on the same party members for a set period.

H.Old:
Consumes 500 MP Casts a buff that attacks up to 15 enemies at 670% damage 8 times and provides surrounding party members a one-time protection against 0 HP.
Cooldown 60 sec.
Heaven's Door cannot be recast on the same party members for 600 sec.
H.New:
MP Cost: 500. Attacks up to 15 enemies at 670% Damage 8 times. This also casts a buff on allies, preventing them from dying one time when their HP is reduced to 0.
Cooldown: 60 sec.
Heaven's Door can't be recast on the same party members for 600 sec.
